item.title: Salutations to the sun and greetings to others
item.summary: Greetings and salutations to people and to the sun at various times of the day.
item.comments: 1) Note on the inside of the back cover of this notebook: 'Finished correcting Sept 15/71 from Jantje Toorm himself', 2) p.250v: note on what to say to one or two men, 3) This story is found in Book II-1
item.author: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
